definition: to unify by using military force (usu. in relation to Taiwan)
lower Cambrian series (geological strata from approx 530 million years ago)

sentences.english: The Daping Varadium-Deposit is a sedimentary Varadium-Depossit formed Low cambrian black rock series.
sentences.chinese: 大坪釩礦牀，爲下寒武統黑色巖系中的沉積釩礦牀。
